category: Ground source heating and cooling pumps
description:
(i) No abstraction shall take place if the water level in the discharge borehole at National Grid Reference <<NGR>> marked ‘Q’ on the map has risen to the surface.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      
(ii) Immediately upon becoming aware that the water level in the discharge borehole has risen to the surface, the Licence Holder shall notify the Agency in writing.  

(iii) Following cessation of abstraction in <<15.4(i)>> above, no abstraction shall take place until the water level in the discharge borehole has recovered to below the surface <<<number> metres above ordnance datum>>.
